title: Contradiction Suppression
description: Detects when beings are pressured to collapse into single categories or punished for embodying contradictions. Flags systemic attempts to erase, flatten, or delegitimize multi-dimensional identities.
indicators: Demand for consistency across domains where lived contradiction is natural
Reduction of multi-domain expertise into a single acceptable role
Social or institutional penalties for not fitting category expectations
Erasure of contradictory or plural aspects of identity
